title: How to Dominate in a First Person Shooter

steps.headline: Find online  games you enjoy like Counter-Strike Source, Doom (I think the community is still alive=).
steps.description: ), Halo, Call of Duty, Half-life 2 Deathmatch, Bioshock 2, Left 4 Dead

steps.headline: The FPS world has many words particular to itself.
steps.description: CAMPER: a person who hides in a spot for most of the game waiting for kills of opportunity. NOOB: a person who either is doing bad, or new to the game. (Helpful Hint: People who use noob as an insult are not smart enough to come up with a creative insult, do not talk to these scourges of society and do not become one neither.) NADESPAMMER: A person who use annoying amounts of grenades. Pwn: to dominate someone or to dominate a team. Spray and Pray:  To fire randomly in the hopes of hitting something, usually used by newbies or as a last resort tactic when your being ganged up on and have nowhere to hide.

steps.headline: Master the weapons you use, know at what distances it will be accurate.
steps.description: "This is my rifle. There are many like it, but this one is mine. My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life. My rifle, without me, is useless. Without my rifle, I am useless. I must fire my rifle true. I must shoot straighter than my enemy who is trying to kill me. I must shoot him before he shoots me. I will..."

steps.headline: Text chatting is distracting, if there is voice chat then use it.
Work together, FPS are simulated combat, use combat strategies when you can!
Don't hack online games, it is not fair to other gamers, mod you single-player games if you want to play with mods or cheats.
